job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Responsibilities:

 

Suitable candidates will be part of Wipro Digital-Intelligent Enterprise practice .The job requires candidates to be proficient in leading a team of ML and NLP developers. Design and develop AI solutions to address business process automation challenges by applying Machine Learning models, Deep Learning, Classification models, statistical methods and NLU/NLP

 

Skills

·        Strong Python 2.7 or above programming skills, usage of open source libraries

·        Experience building AI based automation solutions using platforms like IBM Watson/AWS Sagemaker/Azure ML/ Google APIs etc

·        Applying innovative ideas to extract information from structured and unstructured document images

·        Proficient in applying NLP techniques to process unstructured data content

·        Proficient in modeling techniques such as Entity Extraction, Sequential Modelling (CRF, LSTM etc.)

·        Proficient with Machine learning (Supervised and UnSupervised) algorithms, Clustering, Classification, PCA, Fisher projections and other algorithm Kmeans, SVM, Random Forest.

·        Proficient with Word Embeddings (Glove, Word2Vec).

·        Team Leading capabilities

·        Effective communication skills

·        Agile based development methodology

·        Flexibility for Short Term travels to Client locations.
